front.title: MPLS Sub-Stack Encapsulation for Deterministic Latency Action

abstract.t: This document specifies formats and principals for the MPLS header which contains the Deterministic Latency Action (DLA) option, designed for use over a DetNet network with MPLS data plane. It enables guaranteed latency support and makes scheduling decisions for time-sensitive service running on DetNet nodes that operate within a constrained network domain.
